buffered_stream::async_fill

Start an asynchronous fill. 

template<
    typename ReadHandler = DEFAULT>
DEDUCED async_fill(
    ReadHandler && handler = DEFAULT);
Completion Signature 
void(asio::error_code, std::size_t)
